address.city: City, district, suburb, town, or village.
address.line1: Address line 1 (e.g., street, PO Box, or company name).
address.line2: Address line 2 (e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).

description: An arbitrary string. It is displayed alongside the customer in the dashboard.
metadata: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information
payment_method: The ID of the PaymentMethod to attach to the customer.
